name: Digitaal Toegankelijk
topic: On the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines
desc: Pim, co-founder, and Marieke, a researcher and former CMD student who graduated on accessibility at Active Collective, work on digital accessibility. They started five years ago from a design agency, with roots in app/web development and UX design, driven by the question of how to develop truly accessible digital content. Now, they pursue this mission with a team of eight people.
